subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: For all the good vibes that Siena has generated this season, the team’s biggest national headlines came courtesy of Margaret McCaffery, the wife of the Saints Coach and a former star player at Notre Dame.
snippet: For all the good vibes that Siena has generated this season, the team’s biggest national headlines came courtesy of Margaret McCaffery, the wife of the Saints Coach and a former star player at Notre Dame.
